metadata.description:
"STVDIO NOUVEAU: Remixed‚Äù is a series dedicated to reimagining the work of electronic music and multimedia art duo, STVDIO NOUVEAU.

For STVDIO NOUVEAU: Remixed #1 we bring you a remix of "Bloom", the 7th track from STVDIO NOUVEAU's debut album, "Audiovisual", remixed by electronic music producer Maelstrom.

"Bloom" was originally released on August 27th, 2020 as a single edition NFT on SuperRare, along with the wider release of the "Audiovisual" album on the platform between August 24th and September 17th, 2020.

Track visual by STVDIO NOUVEAU.
metadata.name: Bloom (Maelstrom Remix) #1
metadata.title: Bloom (Maelstrom Remix)
